title: Mt. Gox Moves $956M Worth of BTC As Prices Tank
contentSnippet: The latest on-chain move comes as BTC's spot price continues to slide.

title: What Next For Bitcoin as BTC RSI Flashes Oversold Signal?
contentSnippet: BTC looks oversold, according to the 14-day RSI indicator.

title: Two Technical Signals Hinting at a Bitcoin Bear Market
contentSnippet: Bitcoin's bear market outlook firms as 80% of key on-chain metrics flash red, with derivatives and options traders betting on more downside.

title: TD Cowen Says Strategy's Bitcoin-Buying Engine Remains Intact Despite Market Volatility
contentSnippet: TD Cowen kept its $535 target, citing strong preferred-share demand and rising Bitcoin per share despite a narrowing NAV premium.

title: Bitcoin Crashes Under $90K as Death Cross Creates 'Extreme Fear' Sentiment
contentSnippet: The drop to $89,420 — its lowest level since February — comes just six weeks after prices topped out at a record $126,250, marking a sharp reversal.

title: FDT Welcomes Dubai’s $456M Freeze as Techteryx Seeks to Recover TrueUSD Reserves from Aria
contentSnippet: In a statement to CoinDesk, FDT's Vincent Chok said his company "welcomes any steps that assist Techteryx in pursuing recovery of its funds from the Aria entities."

title: Asia Morning Briefing: Even Prediction Markets Didn’t See Bitcoin’s Selloff Coming
contentSnippet: A fast reset in downside odds mirrors QCP’s warning of flat-footed pro desks, with Glassnode highlighting oversold momentum and moderating ETF outflows.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Dive Deeper Amid AI and Macro Angst
contentSnippet: Bitcoin dropped to its lowest level in six months. Ethereum dipped below $3,000, its lowest point since mid summer.

title: Google Unveils New AI Weather Model With Faster, More Accurate Forecasts
contentSnippet: Google WeatherNext 2 AI-powered Forecasts now support Search, Gemini, Pixel Weather, and Maps weather tools.

title: Survey of AI Founders Predicts Perplexity is the AI Giant Most Likely to Fail
contentSnippet: Perplexity’s growing stack of lawsuits and scraping allegations added fuel to the skepticism voiced by founders and investors last week.

title: Bitcoin Miner Hive's Stock Rises After Record Q2 Revenue, AI Deal
contentSnippet: Hive Digital Technologies began rebounding Monday after an earnings win and Dell deal to power the Bitcoin miner’s growing AI ambitions.

title: Ethereum Is the Opposite of Sam Bankman-Fried's FTX, Says Vitalik Buterin
contentSnippet: Ethereum is decentralized, "can’t be evil," and is a community—everything that FTX wasn’t, ETH founder Vitalik Buterin said Monday.

title: DappRadar Shuts Down, Citing ‘Financially Unsustainable’ Market
contentSnippet: Launched in 2018, the platform had grown into one of the most prominent analytics hubs for on-chain activity.

title: Bitcoin Treasury KindlyMD Extends Stock Collapse After Earnings Delay
contentSnippet: KindlyMD shares dropped another 10% after missing its Q3 earnings deadline, with the company citing merger accounting complexity and warning of major losses ahead.

title: Grayscale Poised to Debut Dogecoin ETF as VanEck's Solana Fund Starts Trading
contentSnippet: A Grayscale ETF tracking popular meme coin Dogecoin could list next next week, while a VanEck Solana fund debuted Monday.

title: Trump International Maldives Hotel Will Offer Tokenized Real Estate Investments
contentSnippet: The Trump Organization is tokenizing the development of its latest real estate venture, a collection of luxury villas in the Maldives.

title: Bitcoin Slips Below $93K as Crypto Weakness Worsens, but Local Bottom Could Be Near, Analysts Say
contentSnippet: BTC has erased all year-to-date gains with the Monday decline, while crypto-related stocks like COIN, CRCL, MSTR, GLXY also plunged.

title: What Next For Dogecoin as Bitcoin 'Death Cross' Puts Major Memecoin in Crosshairs
contentSnippet: Bitcoin's Death Cross, a bearish signal, occurred as the 50-day moving average fell below the 200-day moving average.

title: XRP Slumps 5% as Bitcoin's Break Under $93,000 Leads to Bearish Outlook For Majors
contentSnippet: Broader crypto markets are pressured by weak risk sentiment and technical trading patterns.

title: Kindly MD Delays Earnings Report Filing as Merger Losses Mount; Shares Drop
contentSnippet: Complex post-merger accounting prompts a late filing while losses mount and the shares slip further.
